services.title: Platform Services

smartSearch.description: Advanced filtering to find the right talents for any project.

reportingTracking.title: Reporting and Tracking System
reportingTracking.description: Periodic reports, performance tracking, complaint and invoice management.

invitationsCommunication.title: Invitations and Direct Communication
invitationsCommunication.description: Send invitations to talents, internal messages, instant notifications.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Tawq Platform is a Saudi platform specialized in connecting acting talents with production and advertising companies in a professional and secure way. Our vision is to be the first choice in Saudi Arabia and the Gulf for casting management and talent development.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Facilitating access to talents and developing the entertainment and production industry in the region.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Providing a unified and secure platform that connects talents with production entities and supports their professional growth.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: Professionalism, security, transparency, support for local talents, innovation.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Tawq team includes experts in production, technology, marketing, and customer service, working together to achieve an exceptional experience for every user.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: For any inquiry or support, you can contact us through the form or the following information.

footer.description: Tawq Platform - The first digital casting platform in Saudi Arabia and the Gulf
